entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being irritated and resentful towards Hermione. He is mentioned as saying 'And what are you tutting at us for?' and 'She doesn't know, She's just trying to get us to talk to her again.'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being haughty and superior. She is mentioned as saying 'Well, isn't it obvious?' and marching off.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as being the subject of Ron's concern, with Ron wondering what's wrong with him.
